info.title: Blog Settings
info.description: "Use these endpoints for interacting with Blog objects"

get.summary: Retrieve all blogs. Supports paging and filtering.
get.description: Get the list of blogs. Results can be limited and filtered by creation or updated date.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: The cursor token value to get the next set of results. You can get this from the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return archived Blogs. Defaults to `false`.

parameters.name: createdAfter
parameters.description: Only return Blogs created after the specified time.

parameters.name: createdAt
parameters.description: Only return Blogs created at exactly the specified time.

parameters.name: createdBefore
parameters.description: Only return Blogs created before the specified time.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 100.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Specifies which fields to use for sorting results. Valid fields are `name` and `id`

parameters.name: updatedAfter
parameters.description: Only return Blogs last updated after the specified time.

parameters.name: updatedAt
parameters.description: Only return Blogs last updated at exactly the specified time.

parameters.name: updatedBefore
parameters.description: Only return Blogs last updated before the specified time.

post.summary: Attach a blog to a multi-language group.
post.description: Attach a blog to a multi-language group.

requestBody.description: The JSON representation of the AttachToLangPrimaryRequest object.

post.summary: Create a new language variation from an existing blog.
post.description: Create a new language variation from an existing blog

requestBody.description: The JSON representation of the ContentLanguageCloneRequest object.

post.summary: Detaches a blog from a multi-language group.
post.description: Detaches a blog from a multi-language group.

requestBody.description: The JSON representation of the DetachFromLangGroupRequest object.

put.summary: Set a blog as the primary language of a multi-language group.
put.description: Set a blog as the primary language of a multi-language group.

requestBody.description: The JSON representation of the SetNewLanguagePrimaryRequest object.

post.summary: Explicitly set new languages for each blog in a multi-language group.
post.description: Explicitly set new languages for each blog in a multi-language group.

requestBody.description: The JSON representation of the UpdateLanguagesRequest object.

get.summary: Retrieve a specific blog by ID.
Get the list of blog revisions. Supports paging and filtering.
get.description: Get the list of blog revisions. Results can be limited and filtered by creation or updated date.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: The cursor token value to get the next set of results. You can get this from the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 100.

languages.description: Map of object IDs to associated languages of object in the multi-language group.

primaryId.description: ID of the primary object in the multi-language group.

UpdateLanguagesRequestVNext.description: Request object for updating languages within a multi-language group.

id.description: ID of object to set as primary in multi-language group.

SetNewLanguagePrimaryRequestVNext.description: Request body object for setting a new primary language.

id.description: ID of object to set as primary in multi-language group.

DetachFromLangGroupRequestVNext.description: Request body object for detaching objects from multi-language groups.

correlationId.description: A unique identifier for the request. Include this value with any error reports or support tickets

links.description: A map of link names to associated URIs containing documentation about the error or recommended remediation steps

message.description: A human readable message describing the error along with remediation steps where appropriate

subCategory.description: A specific category that contains more specific detail about the error

example.message: Invalid input (details will vary based on the error)

id.description: ID of object to set as primary in multi-language group.

language.description: Designated language of the object to add to a multi-language group.

primaryId.description: ID of the primary object in the multi-language group.

primaryLanguage.description: Primary language of the multi-language group.

AttachToLangPrimaryRequestVNext.description: Request body object for attaching objects to multi-language groups.

id.description: ID of object to set as primary in multi-language group.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp (ISO8601 format) when this blog version was updated.

VersionBlog.description: Model definition for a Version Blog. Contains metadata describing the version of the Blog. It can be used to view edit history of the settings.

code.description: The status code associated with the error detail

in.description: The name of the field or parameter in which the error was found.

message.description: A human readable message describing the error along with remediation steps where appropriate

subCategory.description: A specific category that contains more specific detail about the error

before.description: A paging cursor token for retrieving previous pages.

link.description: A URL that can be used to retrieve the previous pages' results.

PreviousPage.description: Model definition for a previous page

id.description: ID of object to set as primary in multi-language group.

language.description: Designated language of the object to add to a multi-language group.

primaryLanguage.description: Primary language of the multi-language group.

BlogLanguageCloneRequestVNext.description: Request body object for creating new language variant blog.

CollectionResponseWithTotalBlogForwardPa.description: Response object for collections of blogs with pagination information.

CollectionResponseWithTotalVersionBlog.description: Response object for collections of blog versions with pagination information.

allowComments.description: Boolean determining whether or not this blog allows public comments.

created.description: The timestamp (ISO8601 format) when this blog was created.

deletedAt.description: The timestamp (ISO8601 format) when this Blog was deleted.

htmlTitle.description: The html title of this Blog.

id.description: ID of object to set as primary in multi-language group.

language.description: Designated language of the object to add to a multi-language group.

name.description: The internal name of the blog.

publicAccessRules.description: Rules for require member registration to access private content.

publicAccessRulesEnabled.description: Boolean to determine whether or not to respect publicAccessRules.

publicTitle.description: The public title of this Blog.

translatedFromId.description: ID of the primary Blog this object was translated from.

updated.description: The timestamp (ISO8601 format) when this blog was updated.

after.description: A paging cursor token for retrieving subsequent pages.

link.description: A URL that can be used to retrieve the next page results.

NextPage.description: Model definition for a next page.

email.description: The email address of the user.

fullName.description: The first and last name of the User.

id.description: ID of object to set as primary in multi-language group.

VersionUser.description: Model definition for a VersionUser. Contains addition information about the user who created a version.
